name: Food and Drink 6 - Fruit Quiz | Fruit and Vegetables | 10 Questions

questions.text: What distinguishes a nectarine from a peach?
Which fruit is the plantain related to?
You can tell if a grapefruit is ripe by its color.
Which of these is a muskmelon cultivar?
Which of the following fruits does not belong?
What does the Koran say is the forbidden fruit?
Which fruit is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Banana.

	All the rest have pits or stones.

questions.text: Freestone and clingstone are types of what fruit?
Which fruit has the least nutritional value?
